tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_watchlist (
  customer_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  dob DATE,
  address VARCHAR(100),
  government_watchlist_match BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE watchlists (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  watchlist_name VARCHAR(50),
  watchlist_type VARCHAR(20),
  FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(id)
);

CREATE TABLE customer_data (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  customer_email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE,
  government_watchlist_flag BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE watchlists (
  watchlist_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  watchlist_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  watchlist_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  watchlist_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE flag_history (
  flag_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT NOT NULL,
  watchlist_id INT NOT NULL,
  flag_date DATE,
  flag_reason TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE customers (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  full_name VARCHAR(255),
  email VARCHAR(255),
  phone_number VARCHAR(20),
  address VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE risk_flags (
  flag_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  watchlist_id INT,
  flag_reason TEXT,
  flag_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (watchlist_id) REFERENCES watchlists(watchlist_id)
);

CREATE TABLE CustomerData (
  customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_name VARCHAR(255),
  customer_email VARCHAR(255),
  customer_address VARCHAR(255),
  government_watchlist_flag BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE Watchlist (
  watchlist_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  watchlist_name VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE CustomerWatchlist (
  customer_id UUID,
  watchlist_id UUID,
  flag_reason TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES CustomerData(customer_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (watchlist_id) REFERENCES Watchlist(watchlist_id)
)

CREATE TABLE RiskNotifications (
  notification_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id UUID,
  notification_message TEXT,
  notification_date TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES CustomerData(customer_id)
)

CREATE TABLE FlaggedCustomers (
  customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  flag_reason TEXT,
  flag_date TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES CustomerData(customer_id)
)
